DataElement.preferredName: Patient ECOG Performance Status Fulfill Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator to determine if the patient satisfies the requirements or expectations of the eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to ECOG performance status as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient ECOG Performance Status Fulfill Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Fulfill Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.:Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.
Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/25/2020: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have ECOG score of 0, 1 or 2 (greater than or equal to 50 percent Lansky or Karnofsky)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 2
